resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104867</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104867</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Handheld technology: the basics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Handtechnologie: die Grundlagen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Technologie tenue dans la main : les 
fondations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tecnologia handheld: os princípios</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tecnologia tenuta in mano: i principi 
fondamentali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φορητή τεχνολογία: τα βασικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tecnología handheld: los fundamentos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A brief history of handheld computers and a look at how they work, including a look at operating systems and input and output devices.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine kurze Geschichte der Aktentaschencomputer und
ein Blick auf, wie sie arbeiten, einschließlich einen Blick auf 
Betriebssysteme und Input- und Ausgabemechanismen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une brève histoire des ordinateurs tenus dans la 
main et un regard à la façon dont elles fonctionnent, y compris un 
regard aux systèmes d'exploitation et aux appareils d'entrée et de 
sortie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um history breve de computadores handheld e um 
olhar em como trabalham, including um olhar em sistemas operando-se e 
em dispositivos da entrada e de saída.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una breve storia dei calcolatori tenuti in mano e 
uno sguardo a come funzionano, compreso uno sguardo ai sistemi 
operativi ed ai dispositivi di uscita e dell'input.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συνοπτική ιστορία των φορητών υπολογιστών και ένα
βλέμμα στο πώς λειτουργούν, συμπεριλαμβανομένου ενός βλέμματος 
στα λειτουργικά συστήματα και τις συσκευές εισόδου και εξόδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una historia abreviada de ordenadores handheld y 
una mirada en cómo trabajan, incluyendo una mirada en los sistemas 
operativos y los dispositivos de la entrada de información y de 
salida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104867</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/handheld-technology-the-basics</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
